text: The Thirteen () is a 1936 Soviet action movie directed by Mikhail Romm.ТРИНАДЦАТЬ1936 год It stars Ivan Novoseltsev, Yelena Kuzmina, and Aleksandr Chistyakov. == Actors == * Ivan Novoseltsev - Squadron Commander Ivan Zhuravlyov * Yelena Kuzmina - Marya Nikolaevna Zhuravlyova * Aleksandr Chistyakov - Aleksandr Petrovich Postnikov, geologist * Andrei Fajt - Sub- Colonel Skuratov * Ivan Kuznetsov - Soldier Yusuf Akchurin == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1936 action movies Category:Russian action movies Category:Soviet action movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm Category:Movies set in Turkmenistan
title: The Thirteen
